TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit KeyEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 为 或 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the or event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个 ，它指定用户按下的键以及是否同时按下任何修改键 (CTRL、ALT 和 SHIFT) ，并随每个或事件一起传递 。A , which specifies the key the user pressed and whether any modifier keys (CTRL, ALT, and SHIFT) were pressed at the same time, is passed with each or event. 当用户按任意键时发生此事件。The event occurs when the user presses any key. 用户释放密钥时发生此事件。The event occurs when the user releases the key. 如果键已关闭，但在 用户释放密钥时只会生成一个事件，则每次键重复时，都会发生重复的事件。Duplicate events occur each time the key repeats, if the key is held down, but only one event is generated when the user releases the key. 按下某个键时，也会发生该事件。The event also occurs when a key is pressed. 随每个事件传递 ，并指定作为每个按键的结果而构成的字符。A is passed with each event, and specifies the character that was composed as a result of each key press. 有关事件模型的信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For information about the event model, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何检测按键的状态。The following code examples demonstrate how to detect the state of a key press. **示例 1****Example 1** 下面的代码示例演示如何将 事件与类一起使用 来向应用程序的用户显示弹出式样式帮助。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event with the class to display pop-up style Help to the user of the application. 该示例使用 传递给事件处理程序方法的属性来筛选按 F1 键和修改键的所有变体。The example uses the properties passed to the event handler method to filter for all variations of pressing the F1 key with a modifier key. 当用户按下包含任何键盘修饰符的 F1 的任何变体时，类将在 控件附近显示一个弹出窗口，该窗口类似于 。When the user presses any variation of F1 that includes any keyboard modifier, the class displays a pop-up window, similar to a , near the control. 如果用户按 ALT + F2，将显示不同的帮助弹出窗口，其中显示了其他信息。If the user presses ALT+F2, a different Help pop-up is displayed with additional information. [!code-cpp[KeyEventArgs.Modifiers#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyEventArgs.Modifiers/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[KeyEventArgs.Modifiers#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyEventArgs.Modifiers/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyEventArgs.Modifiers#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyEventArgs.Modifiers/VB/form1.vb#1)] **示例 2****Example 2** 下面的示例确定用户是否按下了 ALT + E，如果鼠标指针位于 ，则允许用户对其进行编辑 。The following example determines whether the user pressed ALT+E, and if the mouse pointer is over a , allows the user to edit that . [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control Members4#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Members4/CPP/controlmembers4.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control Members4#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Members4/CS/controlmembers4.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control Members4#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Members4/VB/controlmembers4.vb#3)] **示例 3****Example 3** 下面的示例确定用户是否按了非数值键，如果是，则 使用属性取消事件 。The following example determines whether the user pressed a non-numeric key, and if so, cancels the event by using the property. [!code-cpp[Control.KeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyDown/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control.KeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyDown/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control.KeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyDown/VB/form1.vb#1)]

span.span: A representing the key that was pressed, combined with any modifier flags that indicate which CTRL, SHIFT, and ALT keys were pressed at the same time.

span.span: Possible values are obtained by applying the bitwise OR (|) operator to constants from the enumeration.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否处理过此事件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the event was handled.

value.span: 表示跳过控件的默认处理； 表示还将该事件传递给默认控件处理程序。

span.span: to bypass the control's default handling; otherwise, to also pass the event along to the default control handler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows 窗体中的不同控件以不同的方式实现。 is implemented differently by different controls within Windows Forms. 对于 子类本机 Win32 控件这样的控件，它将被解释为表示键消息不应传递到基础本机控件。For controls like which subclass native Win32 controls, it is interpreted to mean that the key message should not be passed to the underlying native control. 如果将设置 `Handled` 为 true，则 该控件不会将按键传递 `events` 到基础 Win32 文本框控件，但它仍将显示用户键入的字符。If you set `Handled` to true on a , that control will not pass the key press `events` to the underlying Win32 text box control, but it will still display the characters that the user typed. 如果要阻止当前控件接收按键，请使用 属性。If you want to prevent the current control from receiving a key press, use the property. ## Examples 下面的示例确定用户是否按了非数值键，如果是，则 使用属性取消事件 。The following example determines whether the user pressed a non-numeric key, and if so, cancels the event by using the property. [!code-cpp[Control.KeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyDown/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control.KeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyDown/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control.KeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyDown/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取 或 事件的键盘代码。

span.span: Gets the keyboard code for a or event.

value.span: 作为事件的键代码的 值。

span.span: A value that is the key code for the event.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来确定按下的键。The following code examples show how to use the property to determine which key was pressed. **示例 1****Example 1** 下面的代码示例演示如何将 事件与类一起使用 来向应用程序的用户显示弹出式样式帮助。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event with the class to display pop-up style Help to the user of the application. 该示例使用 传递给事件处理程序方法的属性来筛选按 F1 键和修改键的所有变体。The example uses the properties passed to the event handler method to filter for all variations of pressing the F1 key with a modifier key. 当用户按下包含任何键盘修饰符的 F1 的任何变体时，类将在 控件附近显示一个弹出窗口，该窗口类似于 。When the user presses any variation of F1 that includes any keyboard modifier, the class displays a pop-up window, similar to a , near the control. 如果用户按 ALT + F2，将显示不同的帮助弹出窗口，其中显示了其他信息。If the user presses ALT+F2, a different Help pop-up is displayed with additional information. [!code-cpp[KeyEventArgs.Modifiers#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyEventArgs.Modifiers/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[KeyEventArgs.Modifiers#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyEventArgs.Modifiers/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyEventArgs.Modifiers#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyEventArgs.Modifiers/VB/form1.vb#1)] **示例 2****Example 2** 下面的示例确定用户是否按下了 ALT + E，如果鼠标指针位于 ，则允许用户对其进行编辑 。The following example determines whether the user pressed ALT+E, and if the mouse pointer is over a , allows the user to edit that . [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control Members4#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Members4/CPP/controlmembers4.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control Members4#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Members4/CS/controlmembers4.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control Members4#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Members4/VB/controlmembers4.vb#3)] **示例 3****Example 3** 下面的示例确定用户是否按了非数值键，如果是，则 使用属性取消事件 。The following example determines whether the user pressed a non-numeric key, and if so, cancels the event by using the property. [!code-cpp[Control.KeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyDown/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Control.KeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyDown/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Control.KeyDown#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Control.KeyDown/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取 或 事件的键数据。

span.span: Gets the key data for a or event.

value.span: 一个 ，表示按下的键的键代码以及修饰符标志（指示同时按下的 Ctrl、Shift 和 Alt 键的组合）。

span.span: A representing the key code for the key that was pressed, combined with modifier flags that indicate which combination of CTRL, SHIFT, and ALT keys was pressed at the same time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用中的常量从 属性中提取信息 。You can use constants from to extract information from the property. 使用按位 "与" 运算符比较返回的数据 与中的常量， 以获取有关用户按下的键的信息。Use the bitwise AND operator to compare data returned by with constants in to obtain information about which keys the user pressed. 若要确定是否已按下某个特定的修饰符键，请使用 、 和 属性。To determine whether a specific modifier key was pressed, use the , , and properties. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到一个项目中，该项目包含从继承的类型的实例 ，如 或 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后命名该实例 `Control1` ，并确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#48](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#48)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#48](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#48)]

The integer representation of the property.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到一个项目中，该项目包含从继承的类型的实例 ，如 或 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后命名该实例 `Control1` ，并确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#48](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#48)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#48](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#48)]

public: property System::Windows::Forms::Keys Modifiers { System::Windows::Forms::Keys get(); };

summary.span: 获取 或 事件的修饰符标志。

span.span: Gets the modifier flags for a or event.

summary.span: 这些标志指示按下的 Ctrl、Shift 和 Alt 键的组合。

span.span: The flags indicate which combination of CTRL, SHIFT, and ALT keys was pressed.

value.span: 值，该值表示一个或多个修饰符标志。

span.span: A value representing one or more modifier flags.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要确定是否已按下某个特定的修饰符键，请使用 、 和 属性。To determine whether a specific modifier key was pressed, use the , , and properties. 修饰符标志可以与按位 "或" 组合。Modifier flags can be combined with bitwise OR. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性来确定按下了哪些修改键和主键。The following code example shows how to use the property to determine which modifier keys were pressed along with the primary key. [!code-cpp[KeyEventArgs.Modifiers#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyEventArgs.Modifiers/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[KeyEventArgs.Modifiers#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyEventArgs.Modifiers/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyEventArgs.Modifiers#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/KeyEventArgs.Modifiers/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示键事件是否应传递到基础控件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the key event should be passed on to the underlying control.

value.span: 如果键事件不应该发送到该控件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the key event should not be sent to the control; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以 `true` 在事件处理程序（如）中分配此属性 ，以防止用户输入。You can assign `true` to this property in an event handler such as in order to prevent user input. 设置 为 `true` 还会将设置 为 `true` 。Setting to `true` also sets to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例防止数字击键到达 名为的控件 `textBox1` 。The following code example prevents numeric keystrokes from reaching the control named `textBox1`. [!code-csharp[KeyEventArgs.SuppressKeyPress#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/keyeventargs.suppresskeypress/cs/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[KeyEventArgs.SuppressKeyPress#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/keyeventargs.suppresskeypress/vb/form1.vb#1)]
